MannyPuzzle_01: Do you remember that moment well? And don't tell me you don't understand it. THAT VERY ONE. When a young mind, just growing up, bursts at the seams with the AWARENESS of where it is.
MannyPuzzle_01_1: He understands that there are THINGS around. This EXCITS and EXCITS. And then there are THEM. Those that sound and make noise and radiate warmth. What a sincere and genuine feeling it evokes. TESTING the strength of things and living beings. EXPERIMENTING. And how easy it is to lose that feeling over time.
MannyPuzzle_02: Yet the years go by. Reality, pulsating, expands. Boundaries CRACK and DISSOLVE with each blow. Somewhere out there, cities and wastelands, mountains and seas exist. And you discover them in a world yet unknown. «OTHER THINGS. Strangers, aliens, invading your borders».
MannyPuzzle_02_1: They carry things that make your face twist. Things that make you shudder. Things you don't want to be around. Or, worse, CRUSH inside yourself. Even if they convince you of their usefulness and holiness. These things stink, these things are ugly, they are BROKEN. These sprouts will not grow.
MannyPuzzle_03: And with awareness comes SOMETHING. A shoot that breaks through the rotten mass of feelings and sensations. This feeling has always been with us, since the birth of the ALIVE and UNKNOWN. A mechanism sewn into the very fabric of existence. Oh, what a wondrous instrument this is!
MannyPuzzle_03_1: It compels, it protects, it foretells trouble. This feeling It secretly CONTROLS us, envelops us, dictates our patterns, defines our behavior. We live our ENTIRE life with it. A constant THREAT to our integrity. You rush about, searching for salvation. As if locked in a fickle LABYRINTH.
MannyPuzzle_04: Time drags on painfully. The sense of it is LOST. You while away your time in learning, in discovery, in experimentation. Under the GUARDIANSHIP of those above, in ignorance. A catastrophe is approaching. A NEW STAGE.
MannyPuzzle_04_1: The boundaries are finally broken. They disappear, closing in on a sphere. And then you will see the WORLD. This sight, the things happening within it, will make your heart clench more than once. After all, it concerns YOU.
MannyPuzzle_04_2: The loss of everything. Home, the living, and hope. Only for To start over. Destruction, uprooted, trampled, DESTROYED. There is no foundation, no solid ground here. RECYCLED for the sake of others, for many, for profit.
MannyPuzzle_05: But this is not the only DISCOVERY. Oh no! Understanding all the sorrow of this world, its INJUSTICE and CRUELTY of the living. To you and to each other. You discover STRENGTH. In resistance, a FLAME flares up. A fire that blinds the eyes!
MannyPuzzle_05_1: You rush about, thrashing in AGONY. Resentments, mistakes, failures. They are logs in this blazing fire! But quickly, consuming them, it goes out, leaving only lukewarm and useless ASHES.
MannyPuzzle_05_2: These brief flashes NEVER They will not be the KEY to the exit, to development, to liberation. But you will never understand this.
MannyPuzzle_06: Along with your development, your rooting. As your insignificant figure in this world stretches ever further, something else happens. OTHERS. You remember them, right? Now you have to KNOW them CLOSER. A new experience. THE UNKNOWN.
MannyPuzzle_06_1: These other USELESS creatures in this overcrowded world will appear before you in their NATURE. Sooner or later. And maybe you yourself. Well, do you feel it? How your gaze drops? Your speech falters? Your thoughts become confused? Weightless, like a petal. It's so easy to forget this feeling.
MannyPuzzle_07: Only after going through a long and difficult path, after existing for some time, can you understand...
MannyPuzzle_07_1: To understand that all this is IN VAIN. That you are a useless and pathetic piece of matter. Why do you even exist? You are a nonentity, a weed. All your emotions and feelings, experiences and hopes. It is all NOTHING.
MannyPuzzle_07_2: In the endless darkness of space, on a tiny boulder in zero gravity – you are a wretched CREATURE. Abomination. You need to be LOCKED UP. Forgotten, removed, put AWAY. Your NAME must be ERASED from memory.
MannyPuzzle_08: Realizing this, feeling the REJECTION of your own nature, your own EXISTENCE. A pathetic creature, eternally mistaken, shaking with various emotions, TREMBLING in your pathetic, useless aspirations. MANIPULATING others for their own base goals.
MannyPuzzle_08_1: Only by realizing this can you receive the GIFT of self-awareness. Despite all the TORTURE, despite all the PAIN that life brings. These corridors of SUFFERING and VIOLENCE. In their intricacies, YOU are the greatest of creations. And it is within your power to ASCEND above these base delusions.
MannyPuzzle_08_2: Only then, having accepted your NATURE, looking back on the PATH you have taken, will you understand that it is what makes LIVING worthwhile. And at that moment, a faint smile will touch your lips, and warmth will spread within your chest.
MannyPuzzle_08_3: You will be ready to move on...

Ev104_Desc: The silence of the corridor is pierced by incoherent mumbling. «HELPMEHELPHELPMEHELPME!..» you discern as you approach its source. It turns out to be an agonizing human being with a bloated and swollen lower half. Alo-raspberry and pulsating, it resembles a huge cancerous tumor fused with the floor.
Ev104_Ch1Win: You instantly recognize a plea in a person's gaze. So burning, so urging to action. Without taking your eyes off the unfortunate man's eyes filled with eternal torment, you approach him. A second, and your hand is on his cheek. A moment, and the unknown one melts with a sigh of relief, falling apart.
Ev104_Ch1Fail: The tearful eyes of a stranger call out to you. But what business is it of yours? Another freak in this endless nightmare. As you leave, you do not immediately feel something behind you. And turning around, you notice how something has swelled to a state close to an explosion. Which happens, showering you with a hail of wounding bone fragments and fleshy mess.
Ev104_Ch2Win: Another freak. Even the pleading look in his eyes doesn't touch you. Turning around in search of another path, you almost reflexively dodge the unexpected threat. A slimy tentacle with a bony sting flies past. A moment of failure is enough to seize both the initiative and the tentacle. The outcome of the contest is predictable.
Ev104_Ch2Fail: Inspired by the pleading look of the unfortunate man, you were heading towards him. However, realizing the absurdity of the situation, you stop halfway. This delay is worth a lot. A wounding appendage breaks out from the swollen halves. Fortunately, it pierces the shin and gets stuck there.
Ev104_Ch3Des:
{Ev104_Ch3}
The sight of a stranger sends tension through your guts. Like waves on the seashore, everything is seething inside you. Preoccupied with your own feelings, you do not notice the growth that has emerged from the tumor. Reacting only when it touches your skin. However, it does not try to harm. More quickly... Make contact?
Ev105_Desc: A maid's cart stood motionless in the dim hallway. A pale hand dangled from beneath a pile of dirty laundry. Her fingers moved faintly, and you caught a metallic glint—something clutched in this hand. A quiet groan made your blood run cold. Something useful... or terrible... could be found here. But the main thing was that the «mistress» was already close. Her footsteps came from around the corner. And her «cargo» was still breathing.
Ev105_Ch1Win: Your hand plunges into the rotting rags, through the foul odor and swarming flies. Suddenly, the dead man's hand twitches convulsively, as if demanding help. Your heart stops, but you overcome your terror, snatch the trophy and flee the cursed corridor in panic.
Ev105_Ch1Fail: Hoping to find supplies, you rummage through the cart's dirty linen. Suddenly, a hand shoots up from the rags, clutching your wrist tightly. You desperately try to break free, but the grip won't let go. A sudden flash of pain knocks you unconscious. Waking in a dank hallway, you discover the cart is gone, and a deep wound on your thigh, a reminder of the nightmare.
Ev105_Ch2Win: You reach for the cold fingers, trying with effort to pry them open, when the cart suddenly shudders—an agonizing groan emanates from its depths. The creature inside resists fiercely, but you, overcoming your fear and disgust, snatch the precious object from it. Your heart pounds wildly: in another moment, you must flee before the owner returns.
Ev105_Ch2Fail: You desperately try to pry the bony fingers apart, but your attention slips away—now the hand grabs your own fingers, squeezing them tightly, preventing you from breaking free. Struggling against the grip, your strength drains, you lose track of time, and, exhausted, you collapse next to the cart. When you come to, the cart has disappeared, the hallway is pitch black, and there's not a soul around.
Ev105_Ch3Des:
{Ev105_Ch3}
You quicken your pace, trying to shake off the unsettling feeling that the cart is following you. You stop running and, looking back, see that the cart has stopped—but now a small maid has appeared beside it, smiling ominously in the dim light.
Ev106_Desc: Your foot sinks into the soft grass. You look down in shock- the floor has turned into a grass cover. A hoarse giggle reaches my ears. When you look up, you see in front of you a stooped woman. Her face is disfigured, but you will quickly recognize her. She stops abruptly a meter away from you and says: «An alien! I have something for you! But the sacrifice must be made!»
Ev106_Ch1Win: You can feel the grass getting sticky and warm under your feet. The witch stretches out her gnarled fingers to you, and the skin where she touches turns gray and wilts. With every drop of blood you give, your footsteps are heavier, and her giggles are louder. «Well... a generous newcomer,» she laughs. —Now take mine.«.. gift».
Ev106_Ch1Fail:
You take a step forward, but your body responds with weakness: there is nothing left to give. My veins are ringing with emptiness, and my heart is clenching in protest. The witch squints in displeasure, inhales air.
«An empty vessel... go, fill up, stranger. Then you'll come back.»
Ev106_Ch2Win: The old woman wraps her cold hand around your face, and the world around you blurs like wet paint. The witch's words creep into my ears, spreading inside, leaving empty, ringing holes. Some memories go away and never come back. «That's how... the place was cleared,— she whispers contentedly. — Let my gift take it.»
Ev106_Ch2Fail:
You're going to open your mind to her whispers, but there are already holes inside. Any new losses will tear you apart completely. The witch curls her lips into a petulant grin.
«There's nothing to take... take care of the crumbs, stranger. But the gift can wait.»
Ev106_Ch3Des:
{Ev104_Ch2}
You take a step back, and the grass under your feet rustles angrily, as if it doesn't want to let go. A hoarse giggle follows like the smell of an unwashed body. Without turning around, you feel the witch's heavy, offended gaze on the back of your head.
Ev106_End: You accept a gift, and someone else's power settles under your skin, pulsating to the beat of your heart. The witch licks her dry lips contentedly, her silhouette cuts against the shadows and spreads out like smoke in the corridor gloom. From the darkness he whispers: «See you later, stranger… Debts like to come back»
Ev50_Ch3Des:
{Ev50_Ch3}
Primal rage tears you apart from the inside. The skin on your back splits with a wet crunch, releasing a tangle of slippery tentacles. Your eyes fill with thick blood, clouding the world with a crimson veil. The man freezes, fingers convulsively clenching the hilt of his sword. His jaw cracks open, revealing rows of needle-like teeth. «What a... touching sight,» he hisses, dissolving into the shadows.
Ev43_Ch3Des:
{Ev43_Ch3}
Something stirs deep in your belly, and you know it's not hunger. The skin on your arms rises in waves, revealing slit-like pores. Pale threads crawl out, grabbing bugs with unnatural precision. You hear them crunch as they disappear into your body. The itch subsides, and you do feel better. But your skin doesn't move anymore. It just... waits?
Ev44_Ch3Des:
{Ev44_Ch3}
The crack in the mirror pulsates as if alive, and strange voices whisper in your head: «You're ours...» But you only grin - you're used to being the center of attention, even demonic. «Not bad makeup, fucker!», you throw into the void, adjusting the imaginary microphone. The mirror trembled, the voices fell silent - even the darkness did not expect such impudence. But the reflection is no longer yours...
Ev16_Ch3Des:
{Ev16_Ch3}
Your heart is pounding, but you remember: this is how Caravaggio painted – living shadows. And then you notice – eyes are flickering in the bloody streams. The walls are shaking, the flesh is pulsating. You rush away before the monster takes shape. Behind you – a squelching whisper: “You are already part of the painting...” But you know – art lies. And this saves you.
Ev26_Ch3Des:
{Ev26_Ch3}
Your muscles tense reflexively, years of training taking their toll. You rush forward, your legs cutting through the darkness, and behind you, the whisper of shadows, the stomping of madmen merging into a single mouth. A turn, a jump across the chasm, and now you are safe, but... the silence is too wary. The adrenaline is still boiling, but you know: they haven't left. They are waiting. And the next run will be longer.
Puzzle7_05: There's a torch sticking out of my chest. It can be lit.
VendingPerks: At the back of the corridor, a vending machine flickers against the wall. The screen glows with an unhealthy neon glow, and behind the glass there are rows of cards with symbols — not things, but promises of power. The prices for them are so high that it seems as if the machine does not accept money, but parts of other people's lives.
EnemyEncounter22_1: The administrator's mannequin, which has come to life, slowly turns around, the badge glitters like a fresh scar.The face frozen in surprise does not blink, but the gaze clings to you so intently, as if the figure could not believe that you are still alive.
EnemyEncounter22_2: Every step of the mannequin sounds like a dull, wooden thud.A face frozen in disgust with a raised upper lip and narrow, heavily narrowed eyes examines you as if your very existence here is a dirty stain on an ideal hotel.
EnemyEncounter22_3:
The mannequin seems to crawl out of the wall, the tight tie is twisted like a loop, and the patent leather shoes quietly scratch the floor.
There's fear on his face, his mouth stretched out in a silent scream, and his eyes, round as door peepholes, are fixed behind you, to where, according to his expression, something is already moving.
EnemyEncounter22_4:
The mannequin slowly rolls out into the light, as if afraid to drown in the shadow of the corridor.
There is a heavy, viscous sadness on his face: drooping corners of his mouth, an empty, dull look, and it seems that if he reaches out to you, he will not attack, but simply push you into the same hopelessness that holds him.
EnemyEncounter22_5:
The mannequin jerks out of the darkness, the fingers of his wooden hands are clenched so tightly that a soft crackle of varnish can be heard.
There is suffocating anger on his face: his eyebrows are drawn together, his mouth is pulled into a thin line, and his gaze, darkened and heavy, glides over you as if his only desire is to erase your presence from this hotel.
EnemyEncounter22_6:
The mannequin slowly comes out from behind the screen, as if he had just tried to hide behind it, and timidly puts one leg forward, creaking the hinges.
There is painful embarrassment on his face: his gaze goes to the floor, his lips are awkwardly pursed, as if the figure is apologizing for its own existence, and this makes its rapid, sharp movement towards you look even more unnatural.
EnemyEncounter22_7:
The mannequin slips out of nowhere, the movements are precise and cool, like those of a well-trained staff.
There is cutting contempt on your face: one corner of your mouth is contemptuously raised, your eyes are slightly narrowed, and this appraising glance gliding over you makes it clear that you have already been written off as trash here.
EnemyEncounter22_8:
The mannequin turns gently, like a perfectly rehearsed employee greeting a new guest.
There is a sticky, abnormal joy on his face: his mouth is stretched into an overly wide smile, his teeth are an even stockade, and his eyes, devoid of warmth, study you with such delight, as if the best moment of his shift awaits him — your next death.
EnemyEncounter15: When the lamps flash on, the corridor freezes, and in the silence you can only hear slow footsteps on the carpet; a tall silhouette grows out of the thickened darkness, and a cold voice in your head whispers that your blood is thick and sweet.
EnemyEncounter16: A strange face slowly appears in the mirror on the wall, the skin turns gray like damp wallpaper, the neck bends at an unnatural angle, and as the reflection takes a step forward, it becomes clear that you will not return to the foyer.
SkillPerk_desc: Character's passive ability. Expand to find out the details.
SkillPerk_desc1: Character's combat ability. Open it to find out the details.
D_SkillPerk22_loser: Whenever the world slaps you in the face instead of rewarding you, you stubbornly come back stronger than ever, gaining +1 HP, +1 SAN for each slap.
D_SkillPerk24: You've put your torn feelings back together and you'll never be the same again. In the new cycles, the hotel greets you a little less hostile: +1 Health, +1 max Sanity, +1 k INS for each character in the new game, a one-time reroll of a failed random event.
D_MannyHead_01: <WordWrap>The head of a wooden mannequin with eternally dilated eye sockets, as if the first second of a terrifying discovery was forever stuck in it.
D_MannyHead_02: <WordWrap>The head of a wooden mannequin with lips bent back and a wrinkled nose, which smells with a rotten smell, forcing you to instinctively look away.
D_MannyHead_03: <WordWrap>The head of a wooden mannequin with wide-open eye sockets and a mouth carved into a silent scream, just looking at which the skin runs cold.
D_MannyHead_04: <WordWrap>The head of a wooden mannequin with drooping eye sockets and a thin crack at the mouth, as if he had been silently holding everything unspoken for too long.
D_MannyHead_05: <WordWrap>The head of a wooden mannequin with deeply cut eyebrows and a grinning mouth, as if frozen at the moment when a dull rage is about to break loose.
D_MannyHead_06: <WordWrap>The head of a wooden mannequin with with a downcast look and an awkwardly distorted mouth, as if she herself is trying to hide from your attention.
D_MannyHead_07: <WordWrap>The head of a wooden mannequin with a raised chin and a lip twisted in a barely noticeable grin, as if even a dead tree considers you inferior.
D_MannyHead_08: <WordWrap>The head of a wooden mannequin with a wide frozen smile and carved sparkling eye sockets, whose someone else's joy for some reason causes anxiety, not relief.
D_Bait_Item: <WordWrap>A pile of rotten meat. Unknown origin and not suitable for food.
D_Bait_Use1: Use bait and distract the pursuer at the cost of a few precious minutes or save it for later?
D_Bait_Use2: You leave the bait to decompose in the dim light of the corridor. It smells so sweet and rotten that even the walls seem to be breathing faster. Having smelled this smell, the concierge will forget about you for a while, slowly turning off the route. But while he's tearing up meat somewhere in the dark, you remember: this is just a short reprieve, not salvation.
45АСР_2D: <WordWrap>Cartridge with chemical tracer bullet. Contains toxic substances.
45АСР_3D: <WordWrap>.45 cartridge with an expanding bullet. Shrapnel ruptures vital organs and reduces the enemy's defense.
BlankAmmo_D2: <WordWrap>Strange cartridges with ornate symbols fit the blank-firing revolver. They give off a chill.
Harpoon_D2: <WordWrap>A sharpened wooden stake adapted for firing from an underwater gun.
Buckshot_D2: <WordWrap>A 12 gauge cartridge with an incendiary mixture. Ignites flammable targets.
Buckshot_D3: <WordWrap>A 12 gauge cartridge filled with salt. Has extremely weak killing power.
D_RegretAbility: a deep sense of guilt awakens within you.
D_BloodBurns1: makes strange sounds... Your blood boils in your veins!
D_BloodBurns2: Scarlet threads burst from your wounds!
D_BloodBurns3: You feel your life draining away... The scars on your skin burn!
YouAreAlreadyDead_D: takes away your hopes and dreams.
SafeRoom1: The home environment has given you strength. You feel much better.
SutureMat_get: The sterile shine of instruments too precise for human hands. The needles leave behind not stitches but pale scars-runes. The threads are cold and damp, as if pulled from someone's twilight dreams.
Whiskey: <WordWrap>A bottle of 35 year old whiskey shimmering with amber and gold. Only the wealthiest people can afford such a rare work of distilling art.
VinylRec_Des: <WordWrap>The record chills my fingers, as if carved from permafrost. Do you dare lower the needle?
VinylRec_Play: An old, dust-covered vinyl record player towers in the dim light of a lamp. Its creaking sound evokes the voices of forgotten souls and evokes dark fears. They say anyone who plays a record in this hotel risks losing their mind: the melodies tear at the mind, and madness slowly overtakes the victim. You hear an ominous whisper—the record player is waiting.
